parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the experiment template.

parameters.name: stopConditions
parameters.description: The stop conditions for the experiment. (dict) --- Specifies a stop condition for an experiment. You can define a stop condition as a CloudWatch alarm. The source for the stop condition. Specify aws:cloudwatch:alarm if the stop condition is defined by a CloudWatch alarm. Specify none if there is no stop condition. value (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm.

nested_params.name: source
nested_params.description: The source for the stop condition. Specify aws:cloudwatch:alarm if the stop condition is defined by a CloudWatch alarm. Specify none if there is no stop condition.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm.

parameters.name: targets
parameters.description: The targets for the experiment. (string) --- (dict) --- Specifies a target for an experiment. You must specify at least one Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or at least one resource tag. You cannot specify both. The resource type. The resource type must be supported for the specified action. resourceArns (list) --- The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the targets. (string) --- resourceTags (dict) --- The tags for the target resources. (string) --- (string) --- filters (list) --- The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific attributes. (dict) --- Specifies a filter used for the target resource input in an experiment template. For more information, see Resource filters in the Fault Injection Service User Guide. The attribute path for the filter. The attribute values for the filter. (string) --- Scopes the identified resources to a specific count or percentage. parameters (dict) --- The resource type parameters. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_params.name: resourceType
nested_params.description: The resource type. The resource type must be supported for the specified action.

nested_params.name: resourceArns
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the targets.

nested_params.name: resourceTags
nested_params.description: The tags for the target resources.

nested_params.name: filters
nested_params.description: The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific attributes.

nested_params.name: path
nested_params.description: The attribute path for the filter.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The attribute values for the filter.

nested_params.name: selectionMode
nested_params.description: Scopes the identified resources to a specific count or percentage.

nested_params.name: parameters
nested_params.description: The resource type parameters.

parameters.name: actions
parameters.description: The actions for the experiment. (string) --- (dict) --- Specifies an action for an experiment template. actionId (string) --- The ID of the action. description (string) --- A description for the action. parameters (dict) --- The parameters for the action, if applicable. (string) --- (string) --- targets (dict) --- The targets for the action. (string) --- (string) --- startAfter (list) --- The name of the action that must be completed before the current action starts. Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of the experiment. (string) ---

nested_params.name: actionId
nested_params.description: The ID of the action.

nested_params.name: description
nested_params.description: A description for the action.

nested_params.name: parameters
nested_params.description: The parameters for the action, if applicable.

nested_params.name: targets
nested_params.description: The targets for the action.

nested_params.name: startAfter
nested_params.description: The name of the action that must be completed before the current action starts. Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of the experiment.

parameters.name: logConfiguration
parameters.description: The configuration for experiment logging. cloudWatchLogsConfiguration (dict) --- The configuration for experiment logging to Amazon CloudWatch Logs. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination Amazon CloudWatch Logs log group. s3Configuration (dict) --- The configuration for experiment logging to Amazon S3. The name of the destination bucket. prefix (string) --- The bucket prefix. logSchemaVersion (integer) --- The schema version.

nested_params.name: cloudWatchLogsConfiguration
nested_params.description: The configuration for experiment logging to Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

nested_params.name: logGroupArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the destination Amazon CloudWatch Logs log group.

nested_params.name: s3Configuration
nested_params.description: The configuration for experiment logging to Amazon S3.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: The name of the destination bucket.

nested_params.name: prefix
nested_params.description: The bucket prefix.

nested_params.name: logSchemaVersion
nested_params.description: The schema version.

parameters.name: experimentOptions
parameters.description: The experiment options for the experiment template. emptyTargetResolutionMode (string) --- The empty target resolution mode of the experiment template.

nested_params.name: emptyTargetResolutionMode
nested_params.description: The empty target resolution mode of the experiment template.

parameters.name: experimentReportConfiguration
parameters.description: The experiment report configuration for the experiment template. outputs (dict) --- Describes the output destinations of the experiment report. s3Configuration (dict) --- The S3 destination for the experiment report. bucketName (string) --- The name of the S3 bucket where the experiment report will be stored. prefix (string) --- The prefix of the S3 bucket where the experiment report will be stored. dataSources (dict) --- The data sources for the experiment report. cloudWatchDashboards (list) --- The CloudWatch dashboards to include as data sources in the experiment report. (dict) --- Specifies the CloudWatch dashboard for the experiment report. dashboardIdentifier (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch dashboard to include in the experiment report. preExperimentDuration (string) --- The duration before the experiment start time for the data sources to include in the report. postExperimentDuration (string) --- The duration after the experiment end time for the data sources to include in the report.

nested_params.name: outputs
nested_params.description: Describes the output destinations of the experiment report.

nested_params.name: s3Configuration
nested_params.description: The S3 destination for the experiment report.

nested_params.name: bucketName
nested_params.description: The name of the S3 bucket where the experiment report will be stored.

nested_params.name: prefix
nested_params.description: The prefix of the S3 bucket where the experiment report will be stored.

nested_params.name: dataSources
nested_params.description: The data sources for the experiment report.

nested_params.name: cloudWatchDashboards
nested_params.description: The CloudWatch dashboards to include as data sources in the experiment report.

nested_params.name: dashboardIdentifier
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch dashboard to include in the experiment report.

nested_params.name: preExperimentDuration
nested_params.description: The duration before the experiment start time for the data sources to include in the report.

nested_params.name: postExperimentDuration
nested_params.description: The duration after the experiment end time for the data sources to include in the report.
